citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
According to IACUC documentation, a non affiliated community member was not present at the meetings which were held
on 5/9/22 and 11/28/22, which were the only meetings held in the entire year of 2022. This does not represent a properly
constituted IACUC.
The IACUC must ensure that a community member is in attendance in order to fulfill the role and provide representation
for general community interests in the proper care and treatment of animals.
A community member was appointed and attended the most recent meeting which was held in April of 2023.
**********Correct by July 1, 2023

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Major operative surgeries are conducted at the facility, most recently in April of 2023. The surgical area was found in non
aseptic conditions, including areas of dust and debris as well as a bottle of disinfecting cleanser, an old water bottle, and a
pair of non-sterile work gloves. This does not adhere to the standard of care for these surgical operative procedures, such
as C-sections. Major operative procedure must be conducted in dedicated surgical areas which are maintained in aseptic
conditions. The facility must maintain the surgical areas in aseptic conditions.
********Correct by June 25, 2023 or before the next operative procedure
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(b)(3)(ii) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
According to IACUC documentation, a non affiliated community member was not present at the meetings which were held 
on 5/9/22 and 11/28/22, which were the only meetings held in the entire year of 2022. This does not represent a properly 
constituted IACUC.  
The IACUC must ensure that a community member is in attendance in order to fulfill the role and provide representation 
for general community interests in the proper care and treatment of animals. 
 A community member was appointed and attended the most recent meeting which was held in April of 2023.  
**********Correct by July 1, 2023 
2.31(d)(1)(ix) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
Major operative surgeries are conducted at the facility, most recently in April of 2023. The surgical area was found in non 
aseptic conditions, including areas of dust and debris as well as a bottle of disinfecting cleanser, an old water bottle, and a 
pair of non-sterile work gloves. This does not adhere to the standard of care for these surgical operative procedures, such 
as C-sections. Major operative procedure must be conducted in dedicated surgical areas which are maintained in aseptic 
conditions. The facility must maintain the surgical areas in aseptic conditions. 
 
********Correct by June 25, 2023 or before the next operative procedure 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
